page.title: 03LEISURE TIME BROOMFIELD I
page.content: Although{Chelmsford}is the local entertainment centre{Broomfield}has much to offer. You can go{wind-surfing}in summer in a gravel pit that has been flooded.For Â£5 you get tuition and an hour's{wind- {surfing. { }You may{fish}in the same artificial lake. A season or day ticket will get you entry. Carp and tench are the main fish to be found. If you own a radio-controlled model boat you can use the same pit on certain days. To the rear of the gravel pits lies Channels Golf Club, a private course. The club holds invitation events and amongst its guests was Ray Clements.
